name: Music_4807.wav
keywords: ['amateur recording', 'alternative rock', 'low quality audio', 'distortion guitar', 'bass', 'percussion', 'tambourine', 'slow tempo', 'psychedelic feel', 'guitar scratching', 'emotive voice', 'male voice', 'shaker', 'keyboard fills']
caption: This alternative rock song features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. A shaker is played on every count. At the beginning, a scratch slide is played on the distortion guitar. The bass plays notes in groups of three on the first and second counts of each bar. A keyboard plays repetitive fills in between lines. The voice is emotive and the feel of this song is psychedelic. The audio quality is low. This song can be played in a night driving scene in a movie.
